divs: Sighting DetailsI was visiting my grandmothers house in Solon, Ohio. Solon is located 25 miles south-east of Cleveland, Ohio. The time was around 8 o'clock in the evening. And the sun was setting and I was sitting on the front porch. So I decided to look up at the sun set. And the house faces north. So I looked up at what I thought was an airplane. So I kept on looking at it and it was going unusualy slow. The craft was flying between 20,000 and 25,000 ft. It was a siverish color and I saw it for about 2-3 minutes. When I saw it I quickly went inside to tell my grandmother and I pointed to where it was and it was still in the same area. It was moving to the east. I have seen and I know many different types of aircraft from airliners like the 747 to the airbus 308 and jets like the SR-71 and the F-117 and the B-2 and Black aircraft like the Aurora and the X-32. And after about 2 minutes it was gone it just disappered. I felt really weird because I have never seen any thing like it.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Solon
There were no other sightings in Solon on or around May 22nd 2006
Summary: A silverish cigar shape heading east
